option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --master_port 153249 --nproc_per_node=1 tools/relation_train_net.py --config-file /root/PySGG-cxg/configs/author_predcls.yaml USE_CLUSTER False DEBUG False MODEL.PRETRAINED_DETECTOR_CKPT checkpoints/predcls-BGNNPredictor/2st_dist_cos/model_0021600.pth MODEL.TRAIN_FIRST_STAGE_ONLY False SOLVER.BASE_LR 0.0035 MODEL.TWO_STAGE_ON True MODEL.TWO_STAGE_HEAD.LOSS_TYPE 'cos_loss' SOLVER.IMS_PER_BATCH 8 TEST.IMS_PER_BATCH 1 DATALOADER.NUM_WORKERS 0 SOLVER.VAL_2STAGE True EXPERIMENT_NAME "2st_dist_cos_sample" SOLVER.VAL_PERIOD 400 SOLVER.CHECKPOINT_PERIOD 400 MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.USE_GT_BOX True MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.USE_GT_OBJECT_LABEL True MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.DATA_RESAMPLING_PARAM.REPEAT_FACTOR 0.13 MODEL.ROI_RELATION_HEAD.DATA_RESAMPLING_PARAM.INSTANCE_DROP_RATE 1.6
